alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 3:01PM CST until December 09 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Norman County. In North Dakota, Traill and Cass Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
